content: अभिख्या {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} To see, perceive, view. {@--2@} To be gracious, look graciously. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (ख्यापयति) To tell, declare, make known, proclaim; कलहकंटक इत्यभिख्यापिताख्यः <ls>Dk. 136</ls>; <ls n="Dk.">171</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 205</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">9. 262.</ls>

अभिख्या {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [कर्तरि क्विप्] Going towards; well-known, celebrated. --ख्या [ख्या-अङ्] {@--1@} ({%a%}) Splendour, beauty, lustre; काप्यभिख्या तयोरासीद् व्रजतोः शुद्धवेषयोः <ls>R. 1. 46</ls>; सूर्यापाये न खलु कमलं पुष्यति स्वामभिख्यां <ls>Me. 80</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 43</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">7. 18.</ls> ({%b%}) Look, view, appearance, aspect (<ab>Ved.</ab>). {@--2@} Telling, declaring. {@--3@} Calling, addressing. {@--4@} A name, appellation. {@--5@} A word, synonym. {@--6@} Fame, glory; notoriety (in a bad sense); greatness (माहात्म्यं). {@--7@} Intellect (<ls>Nir.</ls>).
